summary: Larry Talbot returns to his father's castle in Wales and meets a beautiful woman. One fateful night, Talbot escorts her to a local carnival where they meet a mysterious gypsy fortune teller.
cast: Lon Chaney Jr.|Claude Rains|Warren William|Ralph Bellamy|Patric Knowles|Bela Lugosi|Maria Ouspenskaya|Evelyn Ankers|J.M. Kerrigan|Fay Helm|Forrester Harvey|Jessie Arnold|Gertrude Astor|Caroline Frances Cooke|Harry Cording|Margaret Fealy|Gibson Gowland|Leyland Hodgson|Olaf Hytten|La Riana|Connie Leon|Doris Lloyd|Ottola Nesmith|Monty O'Grady|Eddie Polo|Ernie Stanton|Anne G. Sterling|Fanny Sterling|Tom Stevenson|Harry Stubbs|Eric Wilton
title: El hombre lobo
